blog.name: atomic-heart-anomaly

Hella gay for Liu Woods 👀

Commissions and art trades are open!

tags: tagging this in the fandoms that im in because i need to get this out there.
summary: 6/19/18 My official commission sheet! My name’s Tyler, I’m a teenage trans boy who’s in need of some help!  I quit my job that...
caption:
6/19/18

My official commission sheet! My name’s Tyler, I’m a teenage trans boy who’s in need of some help!  I quit my job that made me suicidal and treated me like shit, but I still have animals to feed! I’m currently looking for another Job, but until I can get one, this is my only income. 

For a bust: it’s no extra cost. 

for a half body: its two dollars more. 

and for a full body its only five dollars more. 

If you want more examples of my art, this is my Instagram, or you can check out my art tag: #/myart 

If you can’t commission me, or at least donate, please reblog this and help spread the word!

please dm me if you are interested in a commission!

(PayPal only for payment!) if you want to directly donate, click here!

 I’ve got around 10 fish in my aquarium, that require their food- around 10 dollars a month. I’m running now and will need more soon! 
My bearded dragon eats a lot of Salad, costing me around 20 dollars every two weeks to feed him. and for my Leopard Gecko, he eats mealworms- that I breed and must supply food for- five dollars a month at most for food, but bedding is low and its around 14 dollars. 

That’s only around $50 dollars a month, and only 35 when I have the bedding needed.

It's just another night

And I'm staring at the moon

I saw a shooting star

And thought of you

tags: please send me ships i’m bored
body:
So uh

If anyone wants to send me a ship from bnha,Haikyuu,Danganronpa or whatever I’ve shown interest in on my blog,I’ll gladly put my input on them!

Personally I’m a multi shipper.yes there are some ships I don’t necessarily ship but I won’t put someone down because they ship that.

I thought it would be fun so uhh please 😔

summary:
We are still kids, but we're so in love
Fighting against all odds
I know we'll be alright this time
Darling, just hold my...
body:
We are still kids, but we’re so in love

Fighting against all odds

I know we’ll be alright this time

Darling, just hold my hand

Be my girl, I’ll be your man

I see my future in your eyes

summary: b h p z r bakugou and kirishima (separate) marriage alphabet!! ty!!
question: b h p z r bakugou and kirishima (separate) marriage alphabet!! ty!!
answer:
katsuki bakugou || marriage alphabet

b - baby (would they want kids with you as soon as possible?)

  • definitely not - he’d want to spend his time with you at first. he isn’t the biggest fan of kids either so he wants to make sure it’s definitely something you want before the two of you commit to raising kids. plus he wants to enjoy your marriage and shower you with affection as much as possible before his attentions are taken away from you.

h - honeymoon (what did you two do for your honeymoon?)

  • honestly he isn’t really fussed about what the two of you do, as long as he’s with you. he’d let you delegate it all - but he’d make sure that you knew whether he approved of it or didn’t, though he wouldn’t necessarily make an effort to stop you from doing what you want to do. he just wants to make sure that you enjoy your time and as long as you’re happy he’s happy.
  • he’d spend most of the time just relaxing and enjoying your presence. definitely showers you with affection and spoils you rotten, and there are plenty of late nights too. he’ll enjoy the peace and quiet and show you how much he loves you.

p - pet names (what pet names do you two give each other?)

  • in public: babe, gorgeous, hot stuff.
  • in private: bubba, sweetheart, sweet, sweet thing, baby, baby girl/boy, love.

r - romance (how do you two keep your romance alive?)

  • honestly it never really dies out. it’s always fresh and there’s always something exciting happening in your lives. what keeps it going is the fact that he has to spend a lot of time dedicating himself to his hero work, so he isn’t around you as much as he’d like to be. but in a sense it’s a blessing because he never ever gets sicks of you and you’re probably the only person he can stand for long periods of times. you keep him grounded and he really enjoys being with you.

z - zesty (give me your own zesty letters!)

  • c - commitment (how committed are they to you?): undoubtedly and strongly committed to you. he would never even consider leaving you for someone else and whenever someone tries to manipulate him into leaving you he’s incredibly quick to make sure they know their place and are dealt with. you keep him sane and grounded and he has such a special connection with you - he would never leave you and puts his all into your marriage to make sure it stays strong.

eijirou kirishima || marriage alphabet

b - baby (would they want kids with you as soon as possible?)

  • within reason, yes. he wants to spend as much time with you and just you as possible, but he’s eager to start a family with you too. he wants to have physical proof of the love between the two of you and a family is just that. that being said, he’d wait as long as you want him to wait and he won’t force you to have children immediately - he’ll just make sure you know that he’s open to have them whenever you are ready.

h - honeymoon (what did you two do for your honeymoon?)

  • probably went to some sort of tropical get away - or likely a theme park of some sort like disney. he wants to have lots of fun with you and create lots of memories with you - and this is the way. he wants to have late nights with you watching the fireworks at the parks and stuffing your faces with overpriced sweet treats, but at the same time he wants to be able to chill out at a pool and admire how good you look in a swimsuit. honestly as long as he’s with you then he could care less what the two of you do - he just wants to be with you as much as physically possible.

p - pet names (what pet names do you two give each other?)

  • my love, love, sweetheart, sweet, sweet thing, sweet buns, baby, baby girl/boy, babe, babes, bubba, gorgeous, gorgeous girl/boy, darling.

r - romance (how do you two keep your romance alive?)

  • lots of little things like love letters, flowers on your desk, kisses on your hand, tickles - you name it, eijirou does it. with each day that goes by the romance just deepens and deepens - there’s no end to it and honestly he absolutely loves you so much.

z - zesty (give me your own zesty letters!)

  • t - tickles (does he tickle you a lot?): he loves to tickle to you and he loves to hear you giggling a lot. he really does adore hearing the squeals and giggles slip past your lips and it just makes him feel better. he presses kisses all over your face and lips and absolutely smothers you in love whilst doing it. he’s quick to give you mercy and kisses you a lot after to ask for forgiveness.

———————————————————————————————————–

written on 19/06/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

  • within reason, yes. he wants to spend as much time with you and just you as possible, but he’s eager to start a family with you too. he wants to have physical proof of the love between the two of you and a family is just that. that being said, he’d wait as long as you want him to wait and he won’t force you to have children immediately - he’ll just make sure you know that he’s open to have them whenever you are ready.

  • probably went to some sort of tropical get away - or likely a theme park of some sort like disney. he wants to have lots of fun with you and create lots of memories with you - and this is the way. he wants to have late nights with you watching the fireworks at the parks and stuffing your faces with overpriced sweet treats, but at the same time he wants to be able to chill out at a pool and admire how good you look in a swimsuit. honestly as long as he’s with you then he could care less what the two of you do - he just wants to be with you as much as physically possible.

p - pet names (what pet names do you two give each other?)

  • my love, love, sweetheart, sweet, sweet thing, sweet buns, baby, baby girl/boy, babe, babes, bubba, gorgeous, gorgeous girl/boy, darling.

r - romance (how do you two keep your romance alive?)

  • lots of little things like love letters, flowers on your desk, kisses on your hand, tickles - you name it, eijirou does it. with each day that goes by the romance just deepens and deepens - there’s no end to it and honestly he absolutely loves you so much.

z - zesty (give me your own zesty letters!)

  • t - tickles (does he tickle you a lot?): he loves to tickle to you and he loves to hear you giggling a lot. he really does adore hearing the squeals and giggles slip past your lips and it just makes him feel better. he presses kisses all over your face and lips and absolutely smothers you in love whilst doing it. he’s quick to give you mercy and kisses you a lot after to ask for forgiveness.

———————————————————————————————————–

written on 19/06/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.

summary: An au where all for one has a son (that’s not Izuku) and who also has all for one (but only uses it for good) and goes to U.A...
question: An au where all for one has a son (that’s not Izuku) and who also has all for one (but only uses it for good) and goes to U.A while Izuku does in class 1-A to become a hero (he also hates his dad 4 times as much as Shoto hates his dad)
answer: For some reason, I can only picture a good hearted Shigaraki as the biological All for One son going to U.A that you are describing. It’d be interesting to see him interact with a more disgruntled Izuku in this type of AU lol.

description:
by Demonic0Angel

A yandere stalker who loves him way too much
A mafia lord who will destroy the world for him
A magical ̶g̶i̶r̶l̶ boy who will fight for him
A wereleopard who was rescued and saved by him
And a sex robot who is in his debt

All of these men are part of Bakugou’s harem.

Let’s see what’s in their everyday lives, yeah?

summary: Some more deku!bullie au, so yeah i think their moms just hanged out so much that katsuki basically just taugh izuku the fine...
body:
Some more deku!bullie au, so yeah i think their moms just hanged out so much that katsuki basically just taugh izuku the fine art of delinquency. They just live at each others houses and steal each others clothes (izuku is the worst fashion icon in my mind ok)

So all in all theyre the two best friends that only insult each other and thats the purest form of love between two friends… in their minds ppl often dont get it

summary: My graduation went well ! Thank you !! ❤️ I keep requesting stuff but I’m curious about how iida, kaminari, and shouji would...
question: My graduation went well ! Thank you !! ❤️ I keep requesting stuff but I’m curious about how iida, kaminari, and shouji would react to a new student (possibly future SO 👀) who has a quirk that is similar to poison ivy ? What would they like about the quirk and would they have the new student/SO use it to help themselves? (i.e. helping kaminari with dumb antics, decorating rooms, taking down villains, etc)
answer:
i’m glad!! congratulations and i hope your summer has been fantastic so far!

———————————————————————————————————–

poison ivy || headcanon

———————————————————————————————————–

tenya iida

  • he’s actually really fascinated by it.
  • how can a human be so immune to poisons and toxins?
  • he likes that you have to ability to manipulate plant life to do as you wish and often likes to test your ability to control it by asking you to make shapes with it.
  • low-key scared of your power though.
  • hyper aware of how he can only touch you where something if covering your skin for fear of being poisoned - and if anyone goes to touch you he;s instantly there yelling at them.
  • often asks you to use your plant manipulation for good - usually decorating the classroom or helping to tidy the common room - definitely discourages any mischief.
  • he considers you a valuable ally too when it comes to fighting villains and he knows he can rely on you to tie villains up and make sure that everyone is safe, secured and accounted for.

denki kaminari

  • flashbacks to the sports festival.
  • definitely doesn’t like the fact that you can wrap him up in plants and stuff.
  • but he thinks the poison touch you have is hella freaking cool.
  • he constantly reminds you of how your quirk is similar to poison ivy’s and how you’re basically a real life super hero (lmao).
  • he forgets a lot of the time that he could die from touching you so you definitely need to make sure you’re on guard when he’s around just in case he does something really stupid.
  • definitely gets you to tie people up a lot - mainly bakugou just to see how he’ll react. he often asks you to use your plant manipulation to plants traps and you can tell when he has a mischievous plan in mind by the grin he gives you.

mezo shoji

  • kind of indifferent to be honest.
  • he admires the multiple uses of your quirk though.
  • often asks about the extent of your abilities, and is really observant whenever you demonstrate them.
  • he finds it intriguing that a single touch from you could cause such devastation.
  • definitely makes sure that you know of his admiration for his quirk and ideally would like to have you by his side whenever possible so that you can quickly secure villains - he views you as a valuable ally.

———————————————————————————————————–

written on 19/06/19. requests: CLOSED. match ups: CLOSED.
